* Brand: Compal
* Make : IFL
* Model: 91
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://www.compal.com/Product/Html/notebook/IFL91.htm|Compal IFL91]]</nowiki>
* At sale with Ubuntu preinstalled at <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxkauppa.fi/aryhma/107|linuxkauppa.fi]]</nowiki>, OEM-installation done by <nowiki>[[http://www.linux-tuki.fi/|Linux Support Finland]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues (in Hardy) ===

Only very small glitches. In general has a very solid hardware support and it uses only free and open source hardware drivers.

==== Notes ====
* In Gutsy 3D desktop in possible, but buggy (until Hardy, the graphics card Intel 965 PCI-id 8086:2a02 was <nowiki>[[http://wiki.compiz-fusion.org/Hardware/Blacklist|blacklisted in Compiz]]</nowiki>)

* Some report that audio does not work after suspend: https://bugtrack.alsa-project.org/alsa-bug/view.php?id=3892 (use guest account to view bug info)

* The hard drive may be affected by the SCSI-power management bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/59695
